byline.original: By SAM BORDEN and ANDREW DAS

abstract: United States women's national soccer team players are outraged that their personal information was included in court filing by US Soccer in lawsuit against players' union; US Soccer says disclosure is clerical mistake.
lead_paragraph: “The players are very, very upset,” midfielder Megan Rapinoe said, citing safety and privacy concerns in the disclosure of the women’s national team players’ home and email addresses.

headline.main: U.S. Soccer Lawsuit Disclosed Players’ Personal Information
headline.print_headline: Players’ Personal Details Included in Suit

snippet: “The players are very, very upset,” midfielder Megan Rapinoe said, citing safety and privacy concerns in the disclosure of the women’s national team players’ home and email addresses.

keywords.value: United States Women's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations
